info.title: POS Restful API

get.description: Get all products and variants and prices

delete.description: Deleting product image, digunakan saat akan mengubah gambar atau menghapus gambar di form create/update product

get.description: Get all ingredients with curret summary stock

customer_id.description: public_id of customer, boleh diisi null

customer.description: name of customer, bisa dari schema customer atau input manual atau null
